channel.title: Unable to authenticate packages tor-geoipdb, tor, and python-pyptlib [solved]
channel.description:
Title pretty much says it all.
error triggered using the command "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade"
I am using the latest version 8.2 from the official torrent.
Only having the problem with the gateway, I am assuming this is because these packages are not included in the workstation.
I have reset my tor circuit about 10 times now to no avail. I am using the vpn provider privateinternetaccess.com which is a major provider so I doubt they are trying to MitM me.
I ran whonixcheck a few times to confirm that my tor circuit was in fact resetting like it says it was. Got a new IP each time.
relevant whonixcheck reports: "Whonix News Download Result: Installed Whonix Debian Package 8.2-debpackage1 is outdated!..." "Debian Package Update Check Result: Apt-get reports that 113 packages can be updated..."
thanks in advance

item.title: Unable to authenticate packages tor-geoipdb, tor, and python-pyptlib [solved]
item.dc:creator: idkwhattochoose
item.description:
Wow, I can’t believe I didn’t notice, not sure how that happened.

Thank you so much! I don’t believe in a higher power but I can’t think of a better way to express my gratitude toward you and your project than by saying you’re doing the lord’s work.

Many thanks Patrick

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to authenticate packages tor-geoipdb, tor, and python-pyptlib [solved]
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
8.x is no longer the latest version:
https://www.whonix.org/blog/whonix-anonymous-9-released

If you want to upgrade existing Whonix version using Whonix’s APT repository
Upgrading Whonix 8 to Whonix 9
– You cannot upgrade using apt-get dist-upgrade or you will break the packaging system!
– You can upgrade using these instructions: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_8_to_Whonix_9

I see about additional Whonix News.

Read full topic

Title pretty much says it all.

error triggered using the command “sudo apt-get dist-upgrade”

I am using the latest version 8.2 from the official torrent.

Only having the problem with the gateway, I am assuming this is because these packages are not included in the workstation.

I have reset my tor circuit about 10 times now to no avail. I am using the vpn provider privateinternetaccess.com which is a major provider so I doubt they are trying to MitM me.
